name: trackiellm
description: vcpkg manifest for TrackieLLM C/C++ dependencies.

dependencies.name: onnxruntime
dependencies.description: Core dependency for running computer vision models (YOLO, MiDaS).

dependencies.name: opencv
dependencies.description: Computer vision library for image preprocessing and analysis.

dependencies.name: nlohmann-json
dependencies.description: JSON parser and serializer for C++ configurations.

dependencies.name: gtest
dependencies.description: Google Test framework for writing and running unit tests.

dependencies.name: cuda
dependencies.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for GPU acceleration.

dependencies.name: cudnn
dependencies.description: NVIDIA library for deep learning primitives on CUDA.

dependencies.name: cublas
dependencies.description: Basic linear algebra subprograms (BLAS) library for NVIDIA GPUs.

dependencies.name: rocm
dependencies.description: AMD open compute platform for GPU acceleration on Linux.

dependencies.name: hip
dependencies.description: HIP SDK for portability of C++ applications to AMD/NVIDIA GPUs.

dependencies.name: rocblas
dependencies.description: BLAS library for AMD GPUs, required by HIP applications.

dependencies.name: rocrand
dependencies.description: Random number generation library for AMD GPUs.

dependencies.name: tesseract
dependencies.description: OCR engine for text recognition in images.

dependencies.name: portaudio
dependencies.description: Cross-platform audio I/O library, used for audio capture and playback.
